summary:
Moominvalley 2019 Official Trailer 😍New Moomins Series!  

MOOMINVALLEY is a brand new adaptation of the much-loved Moomin...
caption:
Moominvalley 2019 Official Trailer 😍New Moomins Series!

MOOMINVALLEY is a brand new adaptation of the much-loved Moomin stories of Tove Jansson, a Finnish-Swedish writer and artist whose books have been translated into over 50 languages. Directed to a family primetime audience, the drama fantasy series is full of life and laughter for lifelong Moomin fans and complete newcomers alike. Moominvalley will premiere in Finland on Yle in February 2019 and in UK on Sky One and Sky Kids in April 2019.

summary: Alright, something that genuinely irks me about the new Moominvalley series is how they once again ditched the Erna Tauro...
caption:
Alright, something that genuinely irks me about the new Moominvalley series is how they once again ditched the Erna Tauro compositions, this time in favor of contemporary pop acts. (Seriously now, they’re not even local Nordic artists. Whatever your opinion of the goofy localized theme for the 90s anime, that shit was at least some very authentic Finnish music.)

I get it, the songs were written in Swedish and are a bother to translate, but it’s so sad that the Moomin musical identity is outright ignored. They’re easily some of Tove Jansson’s most beautiful writing and the compositions are very characteristically Nordic. So much wasted potential.

reblog.comment:

(Seriously now, they’re not even local Nordic artists. Whatever your opinion of the goofy localized theme for the 90s anime, that shit was at least some very authentic Finnish music.)

I get it, the songs were written in Swedish and are a bother to translate, but it’s so sad that the Moomin musical identity is outright ignored. They’re easily some of Tove Jansson’s most beautiful writing and the compositions are very characteristically Nordic. So much wasted potential.

question: GAEL HAVE YOU SEEN THE MOOMIN VALLEY TRAILER
answer:
YES I’VE SEEN IT! :) I am really curious about it, I won’t have an opinion until the serie comes out! I just have to say that the soundtrack seems amazing. I can’t wait :) 
What about you guys, what do you think about it? :)

summary: To all the Finns in the new Moominvalley series trailer’s comment section:
title: To all the Finns in the new Moominvalley series trailer’s comment section:
body:
Your series is not “ruined” and while the quality of the clip CAN be argued you shouldn’t knock out something until you’ve tried it. 

Yes, the series is in 3D but that’s how modern times are and I, personally, think the painterly effect is beautiful.

Yes, the voices are not what you’re used to but that doesn’t make them bad.

Give the series a try when it airs. Who knows? You might grow to love it!

And if not, you can continue to watch the dubbed anime you so cherish.

-Love, an open-minded Finn with great love for all things Moomin
